name: Mr FixThis (GlobalGameJam 2020)
description:
Mr FixThis is a game made during the Global Game Jam by 4 e-artsup students.

The theme was : Repair.

In Mr FixThis,  There are broken objects running by and you need to fix them. 

The goal is to repair as many objects as possible.

This game was made by Julien Hembert, Anais Paquet, Sebastien Lepers, Gautier Colavizza and Hugo Lebre.
